entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
